p: The fieldwork method used in these researches was the semistructured interview [ 9, 78], always taking into account the code of ethics of the International Society of Ethnobiology [ 79], complemented by the collection of plant specimens to be identified and deposited in public herbaria. All interviews were digitalised, transcribed and introduced into our database that contains all ethnobotanical data (on medicinal, food and other uses) collected.
